name: Abrar Fahad
review: Wonderful way to learn the fundamentals. The terminal could use a fix - twice now the program was left running(in background) and the file I had open was just completely blanked when I went back. Lost a few hours of work to this.

name: Dipto Ehsan
review: You can complete courses; quizzes, challenge other 'players', write and publish your own code, get help by asking questions and so much more. I'll say it straightforward: this is the BEST app to learn computer languages.

name: Jennifer Lewis
review: Great app for learning. It's written for children, but I think it's great for adults too. The premium cost is reasonable. I appreciate the support and forums available within the app.
